description.value: You make a slashing motion over the brightest source of light, whether it's a torch or the sun in the sky. A gash appears over the light source, visible to all, and devours the light. The entire area within a @Template[type:burst|distance:120] around you is affected by a 9th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkness] spell for 1 minute. The stolen light is channeled to your eyes, granting you greater darkvision for the duration of the effect.
